title: Congratulating Regina and Ronald Gerhard on their 50th Wedding Anniversary
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  congratulating Mr. and Mrs. Ronald Gerhard upon
the occasion of their 50th Wedding Anniversary

WHEREAS, Mr. and Mrs. Ronald Gerhard, of Delmar, New York,  were  united
in  marriage  on  August 13, 1960 at St. Benedict Joseph Labre Church in
Queens; and
  WHEREAS, Regina and Ronald Gerhard are the proud parents of David  and
Michelle  Gerhard  of Voorheesville, Brian and LeAnn Gerhard of Suwanee,
Georgia, and Gregory and Lauren Gerhard of Decatur, Georgia and are also
the loving grandparents of Ryan Gerhard of Albany and Emily  Gerhard  of
Suwanee; and
  WHEREAS,  Regina  and  Ronald  Gerhard  joyously celebrated their 50th
Wedding Anniversary surrounded by their  family,  first  with  an  early
celebration  on  Anna  Maria  Island in Florida in June 2010 arranged by
their children, and later with a second celebration on Long Island  with
many members of their extended family; and
  WHEREAS,  Ronald  Gerhard,  a  Cornell University graduate, is retired
from his career in the health field while Regina Gerhard  is  a  retired
nurse and real estate broker; and
  WHEREAS, Regina and Ronald Gerhard are and always have been a tower of
strength,  support,  understanding  and limitless love for their family;
and
  WHEREAS, Their love, devotion, caring, sensitivity and  responsiveness
to  their  family,  friends and all who know them are their hallmark and
tradition; and
  WHEREAS, Regina and Ronald Gerhard have lived  and  continue  to  live
their lives with great dignity and genuine grace, always demonstrating a
deep  and  continuing  concern  for  human  values and ideals, and in so
doing, they have inspired others to do the same; and
  WHEREAS, This meaningful occasion is the result of the love, hard work
and spirit that this couple has invested in their marriage; and
  WHEREAS, These same values they  have  passed  to  their  loved  ones,
producing  a  family that is close-knit and supportive of its individual
members, public-minded in its relations to the community  and  committed
to the ideals of citizenship upon which this Nation was founded; and
  WHEREAS,  Regina  and  Ronald  Gerhard have touched the lives of their
family and many friends through the shining example of  their  marriage,
which  is  a testament to the devotion and admiration which they possess
for one another; and
  WHEREAS, The longevity of this enduring marriage truly marks  a  mile-
stone in life's journey, an event of personal triumph and joy; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is the sense of this Legislative Body that when an occa-
sion of such importance is brought to our attention, the same should  be
memorialized  by  us  for  the edification and emulation of others; now,
therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
congratulate  Regina  and Ronald Gerhard upon the occasion of their 50th
Wedding Anniversary; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Mr. and Mrs. Ronald Gerhard.
